titleStmt.title: An Ansvver to a late scvrrilovs and scandalovs pamphlet, entituled, The Downfall of old Common councill men
titleStmt.author: Norton, John, 1606-1663.

notesStmt.note: Title page bears a rebus of Norton.
Attributed to John Norton. cf. NUC-pre 1956.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
